sun.jvm.hotspot.ui

Class Annotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • sun.jvm.hotspot.ui.Annotation

  • public class Annotation
extends java.lang.Object
    This can be extended, along with AnnotatedMemoryPanel, to be an arbitrarily complex mechanism, supporting user interaction, etc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Annotation(Address lowAddress, Address highAddress, java.lang.String s)
      The Annotation can handle the sense of lowAddress and highAddress being swapped.

        public void setColor(java.awt.Color c)
        Sets the base color of this annotation. The annotation may render sub-portions in a different color if desired.

      • getColor

        public java.awt.Color getColor()
        Returns the base color of this annotation.

      • computeWidthAndHeight

        public void computeWidthAndHeight(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Computes width and height for this Annotation. Retrieve the computed information using getWidth() and getHeight(). Separated because the width and height only need to be recomputed if the font changes.
